summary: THE AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION FAILED TO SHIFT PROPERLY.  *JB  WHEN COMING TO A COMPLETE STOP AT A STOP LIGHT, ETC., THE TRANSMISSION DISENGAGES, ESPECIALLY TO THE OVERDRIVE POSITION.  THE VEHICLE WON'T MOVE UNLESS THE VEHICLE REVVED.  THE PROBLEM CAN IMMEDIATELY BE CORRECTED BY TURNING OFF THE ENGINE IN PARK AND RESTARTING.  THIS PROBLEM USUALLY WILL OCCUR 3-4 TIME PER DAY.  THE DEALER CANNOT DUPLICATE.  *SCC
